steps.title: 123123 represents completion, new beginnings, and balance.
steps.content: 123123 represents completion, new beginnings, and balance. 123123 is associated with the conclusion of a cycle. If you see it regularly, it could be a sign from your guardian angels that you must prepare for change to occur, and not to be afraid, but instead to use it as a chance to experience something new and to evolve as a person. Now is a time for starting afresh and seizing opportunities for personal growth and adventure—without losing sight of your core self and values. The new beginning could be something you initiate yourself: maybe you’re feeling restless in your job, relationship, friend group, or city, and you need a change. Or maybe it’s something that’s forced upon you—a relationship ending, the loss of a job, or an unexpected opportunity to try something new may present itself, and you may be invited to make a choice as to how to proceed. As Siegel says, 2 also represents the need to make a choice: “Remember, there are two sides to a coin, I could go this way or that way…. [I]t's a timeframe when you're at a bit of a crossroads.”

steps.title: 123123 represents new beginnings and the possibility for growth.
steps.content: 123123 represents new beginnings and the possibility for growth. The number 1 represents the start of something new, while 2 represents balance and duality. The number 3 stands for untapped potential and creativity. Together, the sequence 123 represents completion, the end of a cycle—and the beginning of a new one. With new beginnings come the opportunity to grow as a person, to experience something you’ve never experienced before.

steps.title: 123123 is an invitation for spiritual development.
steps.content: 123123 is an invitation for spiritual development. The changes foretold by 123123 are not limited to the material world! This number is a call to cultivate your spiritual well-being. How can you be more intentional about your spiritual growth? Try initiating a daily yoga practice. A few minutes of yoga a day can boost your sense of peace and harmony. [1] X Research source Practice meditating and manifesting your ideal future. Visualizing what you want will make it more likely to come true. [2] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source Siegel points out, “Number 2 is intuition and your sixth sense,” and that in order to understand what moves to make next in life, you must rely on “your own spiritual guides…. You need to be receptive to your higher self.”

steps.title: If you're in a relationship, 123123 signifies growth.
steps.content: If you're in a relationship, 123123 signifies growth. You and your current partner are in for a season of new opportunities to grow stronger as a couple and get to know one another better. These opportunities may come in the form of growing pains at times, but many of the opportunities will be exciting and joyous. Lean into the changes that lie ahead, confident that you and your partner can weather whatever comes your way. Cultivate exciting opportunities for growth yourself: for instance, instead of planning a date night at the same restaurant where you always eat, try taking salsa dancing lessons instead. New and challenging experiences are great ways to get to know your partner better and foster intimacy.

steps.title: If you're single, 123123 signals a time of personal development.
steps.content: If you're single, 123123 signals a time of personal development. Whether you're single and ready to mingle or happy being on your own, being alone is the perfect opportunity to get to know yourself better and really cultivate your own interests. Relish your own company: take a class and learn how to do something you've always wanted to do, finally finish that novel you've been working on for ten years, or take yourself out on solo dates around town. If you're dating around, enjoy the experience! Each new person you meet marks an opportunity to learn more about a world and perspective that's different from yours, and that can tell you a lot about who you are too.

steps.title: For twin flames, 123123 is a sign to let go.
steps.content: For twin flames, 123123 is a sign to let go. If you've found your twin flame , 123123 is a reminder to practice letting go of control now and again, even when it's scary. This means letting go of your expectations in the relationship, as well as your attachment to wounds from the past. Maybe you worry your flame will forget about you or abandon you if you relinquish control, but in fact, the opposite is probably true: like the saying goes, "If you love something, set it free. If it comes back, it's meant to be." Maybe you're clinging to past hurt because you haven't fully healed. 123123 is a reminder to trust your twin flame to help you move past that wound. They know and love you, and they don't expect you to be perfect, so go easy on yourself.

steps.title: Financial opportunities are on the horizon.
steps.content: Financial opportunities are on the horizon. 123123 is a symbol of expansion and success, so watch out for opportunities to grow your finances. Maybe this means keeping your eyes peeled for a higher-paying position, taking a chance on a lottery card, or just being receptive to the generosity of people of means in your circle. The 3 in 123123 symbolizes creativity and self-expression, indicating you may glean new wealth through creative pursuits, so don't be afraid to go all in on a risky creative endeavor, even if it doesn't seem lucrative. 123123 is all about moving forward courageously; while this doesn't mean abandoning wisdom or acting foolishly, it does mean embracing your inner desires and living with confidence in your own abilities and in the inherent generosity of the divine universe.

steps.title: In the Bible, 1 represents the oneness of God and His creations.
steps.content: In the Bible, 1 represents the oneness of God and His creations. The number 1 represents the omniscient (all-knowing), omnipresent (everywhere), omnipotent (all-powerful) God and His union with the material world, His creation. The number 1 also represents the start and equates the “beginning” with God Himself: “In the beginning was the word, and the word was with God, and the word was God, as Genesis,” the first book in the Bible, begins.

steps.title: 2 represents duality and balance.
steps.content: 2 represents duality and balance. Adam and Eve, heaven and hell, the animals that boarded Noah’s Ark two by two—the Bible is full of references to duality and to the two halves that make up a whole.

steps.title: 3 represents the Trinity.
steps.content: 3 represents the Trinity. God the Father, God the Son, and God the Holy Spirit constitute the Holy Trinity, and together they make up the one overseeing Lord.

steps.title: The date 12/31/23 marked the end of one year and the start of another.
steps.content: The date 12/31/23 marked the end of one year and the start of another. December 31, New Year’s Eve, is a time for making resolutions and for contemplating how you can make the upcoming year even more of a success than the previous one. 12/31/23 was particularly special because it included the angel number 123123 and therefore carried even more potential for change and for cultivating a happier, more purposeful life. But just because that date has passed doesn’t mean it’s too late to harness the power of 123123: it’s never too late to start anew and to take a chance on a better life.

steps.title: Be prepared for positive change.
steps.content: Be prepared for positive change. Siegel says 123 is a symbol of self-love, togetherness, and expansion, so lean into the excitement of the number 123123—but maintain your sense of balance as you take this foray into a new chapter in your life. It’s by remembering who you are that you’ll be able to face change head-on with positivity and open-mindedness.

steps.title: Take stock of your emotions.
steps.content: Take stock of your emotions. The balance represented by the number 2 won’t simply be handed to you—it’s something to work toward by checking in with your thoughts and feelings and working to manage your emotions so that they don’t control you. Journaling is a great way to process emotions and better understand what you want out of life. You might also talk to trusted friends or consider seeing a therapist to help you process difficult feelings and experiences.

steps.title: Delve into your creative spirit.
steps.content: Delve into your creative spirit. 123123 is a sign the time is ripe for self-expression and for cultivating your creativity. Don’t be afraid to try a new art form, or to just dedicate more time to playing and fostering a sense of curiosity and adventure. Pick up a paintbrush or pencil, try a dance class, join a drama club—the options for harnessing your creative potential are endless! Just seize the day with passion and bravery, even when it’s terrifying to put yourself out there and try something new . Nothing worthwhile ever came without a little courage.
